Text.Text: This absolute UNIT makes your factories go BRRRRR! +400% productivity means everything produces at warp speed. Tiberius doesn't just optimize production—he redefines the laws of physics. Workers are confused but thrilled!
Brother of Reform - Following his brother's legacy, this champion of the people summons eager workers to your Coopers and Cookhouses, ensuring food and drink flow like the Tiber itself!
Mother of Heroes - The matriarch of the Gracchi brings her legendary wisdom to Albion, rallying skilled laborers to your workshops and transforming them into beacons of excellence!
Grandfather of Legends - The great Scipio Africanus blesses your residences with his legendary aura, elevating happiness, health, fire safety, knowledge, piety, and prestige to glorious heights!
Mistress of Logistics - This brilliant strategist supercharges all warehouses across the island, ensuring goods flow as swiftly as Roman legions conquering the world!

Admiral Supreme - The first Roman naval victor transforms heavy warships into legendary flagships! Grants incredible speed, devastating firepower, enhanced hull strength, expanded cargo capacity, superior vision range, and minimal upkeep. Your enemies will flee at the sight of your sails! (Large warships only)
Mother of Rome - This devoted matriarch brings the spirit of growth to your residences, welcoming more families into each dwelling and filling your city with bustling life!

Lucius convinced rich Latium citizens & patricians to "slum it" in Tier 1 housing for the good of the empire. How? Nobody knows. Possibly blackmail. Definitely effective! Elite workforce, peasant housing—economics SOLVED!

Lucius convinced rich Latium citizens & patricians to "slum it" in Tier 1 housing for the good of the empire. How? Nobody knows. Possibly blackmail. Definitely effective! Elite workforce, peasant housing—economics SOLVED!

Sextus has MASTERED the art of getting Latium peasants to work at your Tier 3 & 4 buildings. His secret? "It's networking, bro!" Nobody understands but peasants keep showing up. LinkedIn influencer energy!
Decimus runs "Uber but for Albion peasants"—they teleport to your Tier 3 & 4 buildings, work their shifts, vanish. No housing needed! British workers are confused but getting paid. Five-star rating!

Crassus is SO RICH he pays your residence maintenance costs! -50% maintenance = more Denarii in YOUR pocket. He's basically subsidizing your entire housing economy because he can. Was Rome's wealthiest man until that Parthia trip went sideways. RIP king!
